com.mygdx.game.LIBGDXwrapper.gameAdapter

Class AbstractGameWorldAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.LIBGDXwrapper.gameAdapter.AbstractGameWorldAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.mygdx.game.LIBGDXwrapper.gameAdapter.IGameWorldAdapter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlatGameWorldAdapter, SurvivalGameWorldAdapter

    public abstract class AbstractGameWorldAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.mygdx.game.LIBGDXwrapper.gameAdapter.IGameWorldAdapter
    Class that is the base to display graphics and soudns based on a level type, each level type has a wrapper class, that correctly displays the associated assets
